thread.title: Why Kentucky agriculture is banking on hemp PBS NewsHour
thread.title_full: Video: Why Kentucky agriculture is banking on hemp | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: Why Kentucky agriculture is banking on hemp PBS NewsHour
text: A Farm Bill passed by Congress last year included an amendment granting states and universities the right to research hemp. Several states have since started research projects, but Kentucky is at the forefront, experimenting with creating a new industry around this plant. NewsHour's Christopher Booker reports.
